definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
(of an actor, announcer etc) to stumble over words (Tw)
a "screw that never rusts" — sb who selflessly and wholeheartedly serves the Communist Party, like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1], to whom the metaphor is attributed
pinyin: yong3 bu4 sheng1 xiu4 de5 luo2 si1 ding1

sentences.english: Interface of a screw lock assembly areas.
sentences.chinese: 接口处一颗螺丝锁定，组装方面。

sentences.english: We can conform the levelness of the machine by means of shim and screw jack.
sentences.chinese: 我们可能利用垫铁和螺丝千斤顶来调零件器的水平度。

sentences.english: Tighten all the screws when installing the wellhead.
sentences.chinese: 安装井口时，上紧各螺丝。

sentences.english: Loosen setscrew 1 in the oil shieldplate, and remove oil shieldplate 2.
sentences.chinese: 请拧松防油板固定螺丝1，然后卸下防油板2。

sentences.english: Loosen the setscrew that secures the ring with the time meridian indicator.
sentences.chinese: 松开固定时间子午线指示环的定位螺丝。

sentences.english: Loosen but do not remove the subbase screws so that the subbase can move freely.
sentences.chinese: 松开但不要取出座垫固定螺丝，座垫活动了即可。

sentences.english: The screws also promote a particular sense of perspective.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝钉还赋予我们一种从整体出发来看问题的意识。

sentences.english: Screws have been used as fasteners for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝钉已经被当作牢系工具使用有很长的一段时间。

sentences.english: About one minute later, Jay was at her door with screwdriver in hand and took the door off the hinges.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿，杰伊拿着螺丝刀把门上的小五金零件卸下了。

sentences.english: Doctors took X-rays of his chest that showed his insides littered with screws.
sentences.chinese: 医生通过X光片发现他的内脏里到处都是螺丝钉。

sentences.english: And now to unscrew all the screws.
sentences.chinese: 现在就拔螺丝所有螺丝。

sentences.english: And now to unscrew all the screws.
sentences.chinese: 现在就拔螺丝所有螺丝。

sentences.english: The hard drive and memory module are both accessible via screw-secured access panels on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 硬盘和内存模组都可以通过螺丝固定的背板轻松调整。

sentences.english: Remove 2 Philips screws on each side of the bumper in wheel wells.
sentences.chinese: 删除2飞利浦螺丝钉，每边的保险杠在车轮水井。

sentences.english: Five yuan is even not enough for a bowl of Screw Noodles.
sentences.chinese: 五块钱连碗螺丝粉都吃不上。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
